title: Opinion: U.S. scientists must compete internationally, just like auto and steel workers do
description: “We ask auto and steel workers to compete with the world, yet we treat research funding as something that must be protected from it,” an economist writes.
content: “We ask auto and steel workers to compete with the world, yet we treat research funding as something that must be protected from it,” an economist writes.
